name: interconnection
description: Interconnection is a theme based on http://underscores.me/ intended for use on the Wikimedia Diff blog.
author: Hang Do Thi Duc, Chris Koerner

scripts.compile:css: node-sass sass/ -o ./ --output-style expanded && stylelint '*.css' --fix || true && stylelint '*.css' --fix
scripts.watch:css: node-sass --watch sass/ -o ./ --output-style expanded && stylelint '*.css' --fix || true && stylelint '*.css' --fix
scripts.compile: npm run compile:css && npm run compile:rtl
